content.detailedDescription:
I'm normally very sceptical about ufo sightings and stories, but there is an event in my past that i think would deffinately qualify, this is the first time i've ever even mentioned it to anyone because of fear of ridicule. 

one night during the summer of my 3rd grade year, (i was living in vancouver, wa at the time) i went to sleep, it was a normal evening and all was fine until sometime during the middle of the night (possibly 2:00ish) i was abducted by alliens, all i remember was a bright light shining through the slits in the blinds, (couldn't have been a car because there was a large foresty area behind our house that prevented all light from coming through) after that i just have very little memory of what happened to me. anyways, next i knew, i was laying on the couch in the living room (my mom and dad and both my sisters never heard me, it wasn't a large house and my sister would have seen me because had a room just on the other side of the kitchen.) when i woke up, i remember feeling very dizzy and seeing a green and white light, (one of each) through the curtains of the front room window. i have never sleep walked in my life, so we can easily denounce that cause. anyways, when i woke up and saw the light i felt a cold sense of fear come over me, i have no idea what happened but i have no memories of what happened that night and it's kind of frightening. i do have slight glimpses every once in a while, but i'm not certain if i can call these "memories." i see a cold blueish/white light and i am laying on a table, the aliens speak several words that contain clicking sounds mixed with some other sounds like that of normal human words. i also have a memory of entering into their spacecraft and walking accross the grass in my bare feel and walking up the ramp which was very cold to my feet. the only thing that i took away from this encounter was a arrow-shaped scar on my right middle finger, and a sense of emptyness that i still feel to this day. this incedent psychologically effected me for the rest of my life, wondering what on earth they did to me that night.

there was another incedent that could be classified as a sighting. this was in my 9th grade, or 8 possibly around 6-9pm. it was a very large object that flew over my home-town of ocean shores, wa. it was a very thunderous and managed to knock over a few cups in the kitchen, this was also wittnessed by alot of other people in the town. my dad was out getting my sister from some school event when it happened and he heard it and saw it as well. it took a good 2-3 minutes to pass by as it rattled everything in the house. we lived on the lake and i remember seeing the reflection of the object, it was deffinately a triangular object and there were no lights shining off of it, like it didn't want to be seen, if you looked at the sky you probably couldn't make it out but by the reflection on the water i could make it out precisly, oddly it passed directly over my house, the tip of it was almost exactly in line with where i was standing, i'd say it was at least the size of 2 or 3 football fields in length and was putting out a tremendous amount of power, either this was alien or it was a government project, either way it was unidentifiable.
content.summary: 2 events from a while ago

content.detailedDescription:
Very clear night sky.  cold.

an object made up of four orbs moved across the night sky at approximately twice the speed of a typical aircraft.  object was estimated at about 10,000 feet.

the orbs would pulsate in intensity (not flash) and change from green to red.

about 7 times randomly, the entire object would flash a bright white for an instant.

object appeared to be twice as large as a passenger aircraft.

it moved from approximately north to south and then turned to southwest at high speed.  object was observed until it disappeared over the horizon.

passenger aircraft were also in the night sky and had the standard running lights and strobes visible.
content.summary: Multiple orb-ed object moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was taken by my buddy who is flying to new york as i speak , he was in terminal l10 delta airlines at 2:45 pm and noticed this ufo shaped hole in the clouds ,as u can tell its huge and looks like a ufo ripped thru it, it caught his eye and a few other passengers in the terminal. i just thought i would post this in light of all the recent buzz over the ufo activity in the last months over o'hare.
my friend tom who took the picture with his phone said that the clouds reformed and the hole was not visible by 3p.M so it was visible for 15 minutes
content.summary: Ufo shaped hole in clouds over o'hare airport

content.detailedDescription:
The two witnesses were driving together, travelling eastbound on state route 12.  at butler mill road, near porter, they noticed two bright lights shining down from the sky.  they stopped the car to look, but were afraid to get out of their car.  they said that other cars drove by, honking at them.

both witnesses said the two lights appeared to be connected, shining from a single location/craft.  no craft was seen and nothing was heard.

both witnesses called 911 from their cell phones.  after making the report to the 911 center, they drove off.  they noticed that both of their cell phones suddenly lost any signal.
content.summary: Two bright lights shining down from above.

content.detailedDescription: I first spotted it getting onto madison 401 coming off of e highway. it seemed to follow along beside my car so i stopped the car and turned the radio off and had my son in the passenger side roll down the window so we could see if we could here anything. it was definetly not a plane or a helicopter it made like a humming sound and that is when we seen it shoot a red beam of light down towards the ground. we watched it for about ten minutes and then i told my son lets see if it follows us home. so we continue down 401 leaving it behind us and then we went around a curve and there it was in front of us to the right side of the road. it wasnt as low as it had been but it was still very bright and how it got ahead of us without us seeing it was weird. so we continue down 401 to c highway and we could see it the whole time and the closer we got to home the closer it was and follow us home it did,it beat us home when we pulled into the driveway it was hovering above the neighbors house, where it stayed stationary for about 45 minutes and then it was gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Much brighter than a star with a purplish glow around it that shot red beams down towards the ground

content.detailedDescription: While driving east on wilcox drive before reaching the intersection of wilcox and coronado at about 1630 i saw rising into the sky two spherical objects.  the objects appeared to be about three or four miles away rising mostly straight up until reaching the clouds.  when they reached the clouds i lost track of one object and the other moved to the south just below the clouds.  the objects moved very fast, first shooting up about three thousand feet in less than five seconds and then, one object travel south for about two miles in about ten or twelve seconds before i lost it.  both objects were metallic looking spheres and left no visible exhaust or vapor trail.  i wish i knew what i saw, it was the first time in years of keeping my eyes on the sky that i saw something that i clearly couldn���t identify.
content.summary: Two spherical objects east of sierra vista az

content.detailedDescription:
I am a person who had never believed in ufo's, martians, or little green men. i simply did not listen to or get envolved in such *rediculous* matters. these toppics were in my openion very ludacris figmants of over active imaginations. however, due to an event that occured that i hold as phenomenal and simply beyond any *reasonable* explanation i find myself so mystafied that i am contacting you about my own ufo event in my search for answers and i can't believe i'm doing it but here it goes.

i was staying out at my brothers farm in nashville, il. for a couple of weeks helping him with some remodeling on his home and for the most part, everything was pretty normal around there. i always slept in the living room on the sofa when we were through working and eating, resting for another busy day.

it was in the late summer or early fall of the year 2000. my brothers wife, debbie worked the night shift at a local bar and grill,as a cook, in addieville, illinois called the eagles nest. she was at work when we went to bed at approximately 10:30 in the evening. we had to start working early the next morning so naturally, we were not drinking.

i was in a very deep sleep when debbie came home from work in an excited state. she turned the light on and hollered in at me to get up because there was something outside that she wanted me to see. from there she went into my brother, ricks room and told him the same thing except she mentioned to him that there was something in the sky and she didn't know what it was. she told him she thought it was a ufo.

on hearing this i rolled back over to go to sleep but still awake, i heard them walk out the kitchen door and could hear them talking about the color, shape, and size of what they were seeing. when they noticed that i hadn't come outside, my brother rick came in just as excited as debbie with debbie at his side telling me that i had to get up and see this ufo. in response i said, "i do not believe in that ufo crap so leave me alone we have to work in the morning and i'm not working tired", but debbie looked at me and simply said "have i ever lyed to you before and why would i lye about this". i said "no" as they walked outside to view it again and that got my attention. she wouldn't lye about this and neither would my brother.

so that they would leave me alone and i could sleep again, i figured that i would take a look at what they were talking about. as i walked from the front room through the kitchen and walked toward the door which was open, i saw something that woke me up immediately. i was officially curious and sleep was the furthest thing from my mind.

i walked out the door to where they were with my eyes trained on the object and said nothing as they continued to talk. i felt like i was in shock and i could not believe what i was seeing because i didn't believe in such events. a few minutes went by and still in shock, i hadn't said anything. about that time debbie asked me what i thought it was and instantly my mezmerising shock was broken. i turned and looked to my brother and said, "ok, rick, tell me about it and somebody wake me up".

he told me, "believe it or not, i think we are seeing something extrordinairy. i can not explain it except that we must be viewing a ufo".

in response i said to him "is it possible for the government or the militairy to be able to have something so enormous like that?".

in answer,as it stood hovering in silence, he said, "look at the size of that thing and the shape and color and how far away it is and how huge it is. it would be impossible for anyone to be able to construct something so big and brilliant."

description:
it was a enormous pyramid shaped object that looked like it was hovering above the tree lines but i knew it was a greater distance away. it was a brilliant, bright orange with no glare or halo. this object did not appear to be moving. as i looked at it, i was looking for imperfections in the objects shape but it appeared perfect. there was no distortion or fuzzyness. i knew that it wasn't the moon with some sort of gasses because the moon was to the right and the sky was extrordinairily clear that morning. i seen nothing that appeared to be rivits or any sort of writing or print. there were no sort of man made features visable. it was not of any oregion that i have ever seen or known in my life time.

as my trade, i do professional, custom, autobody work, work with many materials and i know about the surface of objects, yet, this was like nothing that i had ever come in contact with and i have no idea what it was made of. it was not an aircraft or giant, orange, glowing, pyramid shaped weather baloon.

time seemed like it flew by as we observed it. we could tell that the object though appearing to stand still, was actually moving slowly away from us because it began to get smaller as we watched.

debbie said, "why don't we get our video camera and film it.", so we all went back inside to get the camera and while we were inside, rick started calling people telling them to look and see if they could see it from where they were and told them to call him back. it wasn't long before the phone started ringing off the hook by a lot of people who others had called to confirm the object. several people came over and some even in their pj's. a few broutht their own video cameras. it was a short time after that before it was almost invisable even from camera view.

it was about 30 to 35 minutes from the time i first saw it to the time it was gone from site. debbie and sally made coffee for everyone who saw it because we all knew after such an event we would not be sleeping any time soon.

the next day:
some people came by the next day who did not show up durring the event and said they did in fact view it as it happened but because of relative positions in the community they did not want to be mentioned. they were afraid that claiming to have seen such an event would stain their name and hurt their position in the community although they too witnessed it and were dumbfounded by it.

debbie was called into work at approximately 11am in the morning. although she was tired she decided to go. someone had called in sick. my brother and i were awake and working in the house and had been awake a short time. rick was in the bathroom working on the shower and i was in the front room working on some trim. i had the tv on scanning the news to see if the news knew anything about the event. to my amazement, it was all over the news because people everywhere were calling in including police officers, medical staff and people from every background even people in 5 other nations. scott afb was tracking the object and confirmed that it wasn't *ours* and no other nation claimed it. the news said that the ufo society would be contacted about the issue (it might have been you guys) and after that i never heard any more about it but would like to know what it was that we saw if possible. my brother and i speak about it periodicaly with friends. 

after this, i don't know what to believe. since the event my e-mail is planetmeister@yahoo.Com, sort of as an inside joke to those of us who saw it.

thank you for letting me tell my story. if you have any questions please contact me. i would be glad to help.

                       p.S. who's out there???


respectfully,

planetmeister
content.summary: We spotted a bright orange pyramid (triangle) shaped object in the summer of 2000 that was huge.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on east 7th avenue in hendersonville, nc. the objects caught my eye, as they were out of the ordinary.  they appeared motionless, yet were very bright, almost like super powered enormous flashlights, or star-like, yet in a bright blue sky, before sunset.  they were higher than planes, maybe cloud height.  one was directly above the other, the lower looking like a plumb bob.  i looked at the clock in my car, and it was 5:35pm.  i looked back at the objects.  the sight lasted about 5 city blocks as i drove just under 20 miles per hour.  without warning or change, they vanished, no trace in the sky.  i don't know how long the objects had been visible before i noticed them.  i was still staring at the sky to see if they would come back, when i noticed a small plane, or helicopter, flying fromt the direction of the asheville airport towards the area of the sky where the objects had been.  seeing the plane removed any doubt that the objects had also perhaps been planes or helicopters.

how i felt - at first i was a little scared. i wasn't in the mood to play war of the worlds.  the fear passed fairly quickly, and then i was very excited.  i had never seen anything like them before.  i wanted to call my husband and tell him to run outside and see them, but then they vanished, and i decided i had better pay attention to my driving.
content.summary: Two star-like objects in a blue cloudless sky. one directly above the other.

content.detailedDescription: This event occured  i believe in august 1953 i was 8 years old a number of people were with me in the barn yard when our attention was directed to a high pitched engine type noise. we look toward the noise and in the air at tree top level appeared what looked like a  expeditor sized twin engined aircraft its propellers were tokenly turning .The vehicle was about 300 feet away and had  larger type portholes down the left side. the occupants were observing us from the portholes the pilot and copilot could be seen perfectly as could those in the portholes,they appeared to be wearing snow white flight suits extremely large white helmets and extra large round dark sunglasses we looked at them they looked at us my impression was they were almost as surprised to see us as we were to see them.There speed was only that of about walking speed there appeared to be some quick movements in the cockpit and the vehicle did a side slip to its right and disappeared behind a small hill we ran toward what we believed was the crash site expecting a explosion nothing appeared to be there that was it.I believe that this was attempted to be reported as a aircraft crash however since no aircraft were missing nothing was done  the person who reported this i believed worked at carp airport whoever he spoke to according to him advised him it was not a aircraft we had seen but something else .,it was impossible for a conventional aircraft to do what this vehicle did .The sighting lasted only a minute or so however that day seemed   one of the longest days of my life.Approximately a month later a school chum and myself observed a large wooden barrel object with what looked like castiron pipes at right angles protruding from it a large cloud was over it and what appeared as a rope or cable was hanging from it no noise was evident this was again at tree top level and only about 200 feet away the object paced us and eventually disappeared behind some taller trees sighting lasted 2 to 3 minutes.
content.summary: Standing in farm with witnesess when heard  a high pitched motor type noise  looked in the direction and a  object  with occupants  was observed at about  300 feet.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking towards kailua-kona from hualalai farms area(well above the ball field looking westlerly). i saw this bright star like object hanging over the ball field(which had the lights on, which are very bright for night time mountain ball team play)what set it apart from the backround was its intensity.There were a few stars just becoming visible but this object was orders of magnetude greater than backround. when i put the field glasses on it, i thought i saw 4 or 5 distinct lights on its base. (which could have been improper focusing). funny thing is...Its back in approximately the same place tonight. submitted...8:02pm feb.14th. 2007 paul schreiber (808)937-0993) (c)
    1)i was standing outside of my friends home
    2)what made me notice it was its intensity
    3)ufo
    4)it was just sitting there above the ballfield(from my vantage point)
    5) i was excited, i haven't seen a ufo since being on kauai in 1998.
    6) i was spending time with my friend. i didn't observe it longer than a half an hour. it stayed motionless the entire time.
content.summary: Very bright object seemingly hanging over the ball field, no other stars visible...

content.detailedDescription: The witness was coming home after work at 12:30-1:30am.  as he turned into his driveway, he noticed a very large orange/reddish ball moving slowly over an adjacent field.  he shut of his trucks engine, heard no sound.  he "flicked" his headlights, no response.  the object was estimated to be the size of his house.  the object was heading south so he started his truck and proceeded back down his driveway to get a better look.  it was heading southerly, it slowly picked up speed, turned south east.  he thinks the object was 200 meters above the field.
content.summary: Returning home from work at 12:30-1:30am witness saw a very large orange/reddish ball moving slowly over a field.

content.detailedDescription: Witness was at the local audubon society walking the nature trails with his wife bird watching.  it was nearing sunset when he noticed a silver, metalic object traveling across the sky "relatively" close to him.  at first he though maybe a bird, no, it stopped and backed up.  he is thinking he is looking at the side view of the object.  his wife could not see it.  after only a minute, the object "faded" into a a black dot and disappeared.  this uis the first of two incidents where his wife was present and could not see the object.  he only reported reaction was to the fact his wife could not see the object.  after his jan 28, 2007 sighting where his wife also could not see what he was pointing out, the wistness is very concerned if he is really seeing things or they are really there.  the witness felt the second and third sightings were not important but his first was significent and would only fill out a report on the first sighting.  i (investigator) has tape recording of his accounts on all three sightings.
content.summary: While hiking nature trails at local audubon society with his wife, witness noticed silver object  moving in sky,  thought maybe an airplane but it stopped backed up then continued only to fade into a black dot and disappear

content.detailedDescription: This evening, i kept hearing crashing sounds on the roof, it's already dark here and there is a lot of snow/ice on the roof.  i went out to make sure my roof was ok, unfortunately, i was not able to see much on the roof, but i happened to look up and there was an object in the sky.  not moving, no sound, with lights flashing in a continuous circular motion.  the night sky was clear to the east, a lot of stars, but this was not a star.  i saw a plane flying from the west heading east toward this object, the next thing i know, the lights went out on the object.  it was over my home, so there is no way i can see it from the windows.  i live close to the 35 bypass and 42.
content.summary: Circular with lights flashing in circles

content.detailedDescription: Witness states he was seated in his living room, facing a window and talking with his 92 year old mother when he happened to glance out the window and saw a round, silver object coming toward his home over a tree line.  at first he thought it might be an aircraft but then it hovered.  he called his wife but she could not locate it.  the object ascended at a 45 degree angle until the window frame blocked his view.  he immediately got up and wnet into the adjacent kitchen, opened the door to get a better look but the object was gone.  he described the object as looking like a "pin ball" from a pin ball machine.  he had no unusual feelings or sensations at the time but he felt compelled to contact nh mufon via email.  this was his third sighting in as many years but those were in a different location on the west side of concord, nh.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witness was seated facing a window in his home talking to his 92 year old mother when he glanced out the window and saw a round, silve object coming towards his home.  it hovered, ascended at 45 degree angle and was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
El otro fue el d���a del mes feb 11 2007 a las 2:32:25 cuando est���bamos en el jard���n de la casa vi el objeto y sal��� a traer la c���mara para tomarle video.
nos encotrabamos mi yerno y yo.
content.summary: Reportefeb2

content.detailedDescription: My wife and family were driving back from a trip to cincinatti, ohio on february 11, 2007. we were approximately 5-10 miles north of us 35 heading north on i-71 when my wife noticed a bright object in the sky to my left which would have been towards the east. i looked out the window and saw a bright, silver type of light in the shape of egg but seemed spherical as well. my first thought was it wasn't bright enough to be an airplane but it was brighter than a star. my wife asked me what i thought it was and i realized it was not moving nor was there any blinking lights that i could see. we watched as i drove for about 2 to 3 minutes and went down a small dip in the road and it was obscured by a small grouping of trees and i looked at the road and looked back and it was gone. i mean gone. i slowed down to about 30 miles an hour and we could not spot it anywhere in the eastern sky. i do not have any pictures but i could draw it if asked. i was curious if anyone else reported seeing anything in this area, on this night. you can e-mail me if you have any questions. thanks.
content.summary: Saw object over farm field while driving.

content.detailedDescription: Witness was parked at the boat ramp area of little turkey pond 9 to 10 pm,edst watching the stars as his habit.  first though he was seeing an airplane but realized it was too large and hovering, blotting out a huge area of the sky.  the object had a red, green and blue light, each to a corner.  the lights seperated and traveled in different directions only to rejoin moments later.  it then "just left".  whitness is very vague on its departure. he first said it vanished, then added it moved away and was gone.  no sound was heard, no smells.  the witness is an educator with degrees from harvard, columbia and u.Of maine.  he is fascinated and curious as to what it was.  this is witnesses third sighting in three years.  he only wanted to file reports on this, the most important.
content.summary: Extremely large triangular object, lights on each corner, lights seperated spread apart, rejoined, disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
El otro fue el d���a 13 de feb 2007 a las 7:43pm. esto sucedi��� cuando me encontraba escribiendo en mi cuarto, y escuche a los perros ladrar y sal��� a ver quien era y cuando vi arriba ah��� estaba con sus grandes luces, pronto como siempre entre corriendo por la c���mara y le tome el video, una avioneta iba detr���s de el y el despacito como si no le importara.
paresia un avi���n pero nunca e visto un avi���n que tenga esas clases de luces tan grandes y redondas, lo digo por que vivo cerca de un aeropuerto y tanto ver aviones se decirles que este no era un avi���n. y si lo es pues a de ser un nuevo modelito que no hab���a visto antes.
a prop���sito "feliz d���a de la amistad"

siempre escucharan sonidos de aviones por que vivo cerca de un areopuerto. y por eso se como se ven por la noche y puedo reconocer lo que parece no ser avion ni avioneta.

content.detailedDescription: En este video les muestro tres artefactos que se ven un poco extra���os uno lo vi el 8 de feb 2007 a las 11:32:42  cuando estaba afuera de mi casa platicando con mi hija.
content.summary: Objeto no identificado

content.detailedDescription: Taking photos of sunset from dukes restruant in waikiki around 6:30pm.  no object was seen while looking into the sun.  however, object was captured on film in one of several sunset shots.  found the spot in the picture after reviewing them some days later.
content.summary: Captured object in picture of sunset, which appeared in a distorted shadowy  shape

content.detailedDescription:
My vantage point was from outside my office in woodland hills, ca. i noticed a large (747) fedex jet flying over my office and i thought it was strange for such a large jet to be headed towards burbank airport, as this airfield is generally for smaller commercial aircraft.

as i watched to see if the plane would turn into the landing pattern for burbank airport, i noticed a bright point of light in the cloud directly behind the fedex jet. at first i only saw one object then i noticed there were at least 2 others.

the lights i saw were an amber color. almost as if the object was reflecting the setting sun to the west. i believe i saw 3 distinct objects. but they were only visible as a group for a short period of time. each point of light would vary in intensity. from very bright (they seemed to expand as the light got brighter), to barely visible. the lights had to be quite bright because the objects were clearly visible while being either in the cloud or behind it. and the cloud itself was rather dark.

now, these lights were moving in some rather strange patterns. i would describe the flight patterns as parabolic. they would move in one direction and perform what i would describe as a 'u-turn' and move back in the other direction. these 'u-turns' were executed at a high rate of speed. at one point i saw multiple lights performing these manuevers. it resembled two squirreles chasing each other around and up a tree.

at one point one of the lights was performing the parabaolic maneuver (on an off axis) and it stopped in its tracks. it hovered in that position for roughly 10 seconds. then without a noticeable acceleration period, continued the maneuver at the same high rate of speed.

all of the movement i witnessed was at a relatively high rate of speed. i would estimate the altitude to be about 10-15,000 feet and the distance from myself to the objects at about 20 miles. i have never seen an object in the air travel this fast or manuever like these objects did. 

at no time were these objects visible outside the the cloud that was moving past. 

the whole episode lasted 8-10 minutes. at which point the cloud had changed its shape and had moved off into the distance and the objects were no longer appearing.

i have always been on the fence about the ufo phenomenon. i always believed that people were seeing something, but what they are seeing as of today has not been explained. what i saw today seems to be textbook from what i have heard others have seen - objects moving in a manner that cannot be explained by conventional physics

summary - bright points of light in the sky executing manuevers that conventional aircraft (at least any aircraft i am aware of) could not. executing these manuevers at a high rate of speed and stopping/starting on a dime. 

i am quick to point out that i am not claiming i saw et. the truth is, i have no friggin clue what these objects were. all i know is what i saw. i do not drink or use drugs, so i am pretty sure i was not hallucinating. and the fact that i witnessed this over a considerable period of time as apposed to a split second out of the corner of my eye, makes me think i wasn't seeing things that were not there.

i am curious if any others in the san fernanado valley area saw what i saw. i do know that unless the viewer happened to be looking in that exact area of the sky, they would not have noticed it.

i was walking to my car form work so i did not have a camera or video camera on my person. all i have is my eyewitness account.

please respond if any other reports of this sighting are filed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Points of light manuevering in parabolic patterns at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I'll bgin with this; this same day only hours later than my sighting, our local news reported people seeing a ufo from los angeles, all the way to seattle, washington. i give you that sighting because i can't remember what time of year, or day it was. i hope you can fix a day and year to this for both of us. i work swing shift security for dshs juvenile rehab at maple lane shool about 20 miles south of olympia. i entered the office and shift change was going on with the passing of information on the days events, over to us. it's a small office, maybe 10by20. i sat in a chair next to the windows facing west, watching the clouds cover the sunset at due west. the clouds were large cumulis, some dark with moisture, and some light. my gaze was interuped with this object moving from right to left, or from noth to south, estimating about 10 miles away. i remember looking very intently as it began to emerge from a cloud into the open in front of another cloud that was dark as a whole. at this time i got up and went outside for a more clearer look. what caught my eye, was this very dark object moving, and as i kept looking, i could see that it was part of a larger object that looked cigar shaped, and if you hold your thumb up at arms length sideways, that is about the size of this object. the leading edge or front with the cocpit, resembled a boeing 747 but with no hump like a 747. the body did not appear to have windows of any type, and it had no wings, tails, or any stablizers. the end of the craft seemed to have the appearence of being flat, vertically, as if cut off. it was moving so slow estimating the speed at about 15 mph. i watched it for about 5 minutes as it just seemed to glide. then i noticed that it was turning away from me headed due west into this dark cloud that was the background for this event. it turned as slow as it was traveling and appeared to seemingly pivot from left to right. it seemed to keep it's speed and disapear into that cloud as if you slowly were to put your finger into a glass of water---slowly! iam familiar with diferent kinds of aircraft, as my brother and me have flown together for 30 years or so. he is a private pilot with all the ratings. there was no sign of propulsion of any kind, and no sound that was detectable by me. this is not my first sighting here in washington, and california. i hope i have been of some help, and could you let me know when this may have happened. i have another sighting from last year which i will put on another e-mail. thanks------doug
content.summary: Cigar shape,quite large, darkened cocpit area dark, very light gray, or white, no wings, tail, or any other stablizing apparatus.

content.detailedDescription: It was a warm night in early june around 3 am. i was working as a night surpervisor for a machine shop in clarksville indiana. it was kind of stuffy inside the building with all the machines running,so i stepped out side to cool off. the area i was in has alot of air traffic in the area, mostly big u.P.S planes,and passenger jets going in and coming out of louisville international. the flight path for approach was right over the building,it was a normal night and they were stacked in formation 5 deep at times. i was smoking a cigarette and watching them go over the building when they broke pattern and left. it was a hazy night,but clear so you could see a good distance. one minute there were 10 planes in the sky,some orbiting, some in single file. the next they had all faded in the distance.  when i noticed this strange colored light in the sky to the northwest,over downtown clarksville. it got my attention because it was a deep ruby red color,and instead of blinking on/off like airplane lights,it pulsed from very bright to dim. it was as bright as white,aircraft landing lights only it was deep red. it moved with a non ballistic motion,it moved forward when it was bright,and completely stopped when dim. i was watching it move to the east for a few minutes,i was so amazed with the motion,that i ran back into the building to get my my younger brother{he worked for me at the time},to come out and see this.   he said the same thing i thought when i first saw it...Holy sh$#.  we stood there watching it asking each other if the other was seeing the strange movement. no noise whatsoever. it must have been more than 5 minutes by now,it was starting to move southeast towards us,and i actually ran back in the building again,and called my father!  i was actually screaming in the phone for him to go outside and see this.  i ran back outside and sure enough it was still there,and now almost directly over the building.  im estimating it was 10000 feet at least 20 feet across. it was still just a sphere,no other lights on it,no structure visible.  by now its moved over the building to the east,and we were both watching this intently,when a basketball sized sphere dropped out of the bottom. the smaller one was unlit,we only saw it because the larger sphere was so bright,it reflected off the smaller one.  as it dropped the smaller sphere,it blinked out.   we were looking for it to reappear,for maybe 15 to 30 seconds,when a fighter jet{f-4} came from the east right to the exact spot it had just been. the f-4 was very loud,and it slowed down approximately where the light had just been and it dipped it's wings back and forth,like he was scanning for this thing.  he turned north ,then turned back to the east. and left the same way he came from.  here we both are with our mouths wide open,looking at each other like"what the hell just happened".  nothing ever hit the ground. there was no story about it in the news.  louisville international airport had to see this thing.  for the last 10 years i wondered what the hell that thing was,what it dropped.  i still have no idea,but i do know that it was'nt anything of ours.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Deep ruby red colored orb displaying non-ballistic motion,moves slowly across sky and drops smaller unlit sphere before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: I am writing this after reading of mufon in today's denver post (2/12/07) i reported this incident on a website (maybe this one) the next day after it happened, said i'd be happy (anxious, in fact) to talk to an investigator and got no response.  now i'm really anxious that someone notices this report, because today i read on this site of a sighting this same night (oct. 1, 2006)at approximately 15 min. earlier, in huerfano county (which is se of where i saw the ufo; it would have been traveling nw when i saw it!) so...I was commuting to denver from montrose as i do almost every weekend, between my home there and my work in denver.  i was very late this time,but i had napped first, so i didn't feel drowsy.  i was about 10 mi. west of vail, closer to edwards (where there is a small airfield).  i was fairly close to the eagle river.  it was in a valley where lifestock grazes; otherwise, no light pollution, no buildings, little traffic on the road at this time.  i happened to look up at the southern horizon and noticed several streaks of light which looked like shooting stars. i expected them to fizzle out, but, instead, they stopped abruptly  above the highway and i was looking at a globular formation of glowing (shimmering) lights, perfectly spaced--i would say five or six of them in a cluster. each light was large and round (i can't really say how high up they might have been, but i judged them at height a helicoptor might fly).  they hovered to south of the road, then disappeared for a second or two and reappeared to north of the road.  it seemed they had shifted their position at the same altitude and held the same formation.  they hovered there for a few seconds, then ascended at about a 45 degree angle and disappeared on the northern horizon (just the reverse of the way they had entered my field of vision).  i would say that the whole episode must have lasted from five to 10 minutes.  i was able to pull my car to the shoulder and watch with the motor running while this was going on. it was dark and cold out, so i didn't get out of the care, but watched through the windshield.  i heard nothing (radio off--though i hadn't been getting any reception--strange near vail).  i thought it was odd that a few big trucks passed me on the highway, apparently not taking notice of this!!  when it was all over, i was in wonder.  this was absolutely not like anything i'd ever seen in the sky!  it moved much too fast to be any type of aircraft i've ever even heard of, and it disappeared and reappeared!!  i'm still amazed that i saw this at all.  but the other report from further south in the state (maybe 150-200 mi. s) confirms in my mind that i must have seen the same thing--just that the other sighting was of balls flying in a line-up type of formation, instead.  i am very excited to think that that sighting might well confirm what i saw!!
content.summary: As i was driving east on 1-70, saw "shooting stars" from southern horizon; they hovered to south of highway in circle formation (5-6), shimmering; disappeared and reappears seconds later to north of highway, then shot back up to northern horizon
Sighting of star-like object moving against stars.
Disk-shaped object and four orbs.

content.detailedDescription: Schmidt reports that he was sitting on a stump at the edge of the woods, near to his home.  it was twilight.  he heard (apparently telepathically) a buzzing in his head, as he had heard during his previous encounter with the same (or similar) craft.  he saw a glowing, disk-shaped craft shoot across the sky, followed by four glowing orbs (glowing green, red/orange, yellow and purple).  the green orb stopped and hovered, then the red one came back, bumped into the green one, then both followed the disk out of sight.
content.summary: Disk-shaped object followed by four orbs.  all glowing.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed huge red light in sky, in northern sky . object remained stable for many minutes , then moved slowly south and stopped again for several minutes and then moved south -east and stopped again for several minutes and then moved more quickly south and stopped for 3or 4 minutes and then disappeared ??   got phone call from freind telling me to look in the sky!! whent out side and looked up to the northern sky and saw the object , it was huge , waited for it to do some thing , it stayed still for a few minutes and then moved as i described . i took photos and they came out good!!!!   i have attached photo , i hope they get to you ! i will be glad to talk with someone about the siteing !  my girl freind was the one that called me and told mme to look out side , we watched it while on the phone together untill it disappeared!  we both took photos , mine are with a delephoto lence and hers are with out .Hope to hear from you!!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge red light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Kerwin reimer, male 35, reports repeatedly seeing bright lights in both the day and night sky that he believes have been following him around since the year 1997.

reimer contacted kansas mufon assistant state director tracey c. smith by telephone on 02/11/2007 at approximately 1611 hrs.

reimer stated that he was standing at the corner of 21st and n. oliver streets in wichita. reimer stated that "bright lights in the sky" had been watching him and following him all day, despite the fact that no one else could see them. reimer stated that this has been going on continually since 1997.

reimer described a "mothership" that looked like a "bright cluster of bananas."

at times, reimer sounded incoherent during the brief conversation.

i advised him that i would take his information and thanked him for calling.

this investigator has nothing further to report at this time.

tracey c. smith
assistant state director,
kansas mufon
content.summary: Ufo witness claims to have been followed by bright lights in sky from 1997 to the present date.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a break from yardwork and went to set on a table in the shade. i sat down and laid back on the table and as i did i saw some motion in the sky. it was a perfect late summer sky clear and blue. i took a look at it and it was in the southeast at about one o'clock and it was motionless just a hint of reflection from the sun. the object was cylindrical but the ends had definition, it wasn't close enough to see windows. i thought i don't want to move but damn is this real. i sat up and watched it for a couple of seconds and it moved slightly the end i was looking at switched from left to right and it went back in a the northerly direction so quick i couldn't follow it.
content.summary: Cylindrical,metalic
